overview:
Sebastian Kreutzberger is the CTO of 6Wunderkinder. He leads the development team of Wunderlist, the award-winning productivity software, and the upcoming game-changer Wunderkit. His long-year management experience is a valuable asset as 6Wunderkinder evolve from being a hot, young startup to a mature, and industry leading, company.

Sebastianâ€™s proven understanding of the technical requirements of modern cloud-based web architecture, with the need for high scalability and high availability, allow 6Wunderkinderâ€™s upcoming products to be future-proof and rock solid.

Prior to his work at 6Wunderkinder, Sebastian was the Founder and Managing Director of several startups in Europe and in the US.

Bio: http://about.me/sebastiankreutzberger
